title: Matchmaking
body: I win with good teams a bunch of times in a row. I get to 92 LP because the goofy LP gains. Then I get put with people who absolutely flop. I go down to 0 LP. Repeat repeat repeat repeat repeat repeat. League you have wasted my day.

replies.body: That's just how it is sometimes. I failed my series games 3 times in a row before finally getting past, and now I am in the next rank in the same boat - failing all of my promos.
